title: The Breach (Part 3)
body: I've finally made it out of the lab, yes! I can now safely research this new plane of existence, and gain a better understanding of it! The lab is totalled though, so I will need some new equipment...maybe the subjects can provide some for me, there should be enough resources there to make at least basic scientific gear, and perhaps find ways to exploit space and furthur pocket dimesions in this new place. - Experiment Log 3
